activities: App Annie receives personal information regarding natural persons located in the EEA and/or Switzerland in connection with activities such as the distribution of software as a service offerings and market research services within member states of the EEA and/or Switzerland. For our users located in EU/EEA and/or Switzerland, we process and manage account data, including customer and employee names, information about analytics data, and information about advertising campaigns. In these contexts, App Annie acts as a data processor. As part of App Annie’s internal operations (e.g., sales, billing, marketing, human resources, employee services), App Annie transfers personal data of (1) current and prospective customers; (2) current and prospective business partners; and (3) employees and non-employee personnel to U.S. data centers for processing and storage. In these contexts, App Annie acts as a data controller.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: off-line, on-line, manually processed, human resources data
